resources.string: The following options let you choose one of your installed icon packs to use for these options. The first option takes quite some cpu power and takes therefore a bit of time. if you don\'t need it disable it.
Show second icon from an icon pack
Show only apps that currently doesn\'t have an themed icon
With this tool you can request icons for apps that are missing from icon packs.
Select this option if you think one of your apps should have an icon, but doesn\'t, or if some of your icons broke after an update. You only need to copy and paste some text for this option.
Select this option if you want to submit new icons. You will have to submit a file with your icon request.
There are no email clients installed.
Couldn\'t get appfilter from the icon pack
No apps selected. Select at least one app.
Some app icons are missing on my device.\n\n
Compare two Icon Packs. Shows apps that aren\'t in the first icon pack from the second icon pack
Show shortcut widgets insted of apps
